text: Ara kona kona bedu'ina hala tara, yara imana ane allahara upara, keyamata dinera upara ebam nijedera byayake allahara naikatya ebam rasulera doya labhera upaya bale ganya kare. Jeno! Ta'i hala tadera ksetre naikatya. Allaha taderake nijera rahamatera antarbhukta karabena. Niscaya'i allaha ksamasila, karunamaya.
